availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Barren County, Kentucky, farmer. Virginia native. Married to Lucy Richardson Roberts. Father of Frances C. Roberts, Sarah C. Roberts, Judith C. Roberts, William H. Roberts, James M. Roberts, and Mary Roberts. Farmer in Barren County in 1850. Employed William H. Roberts as a farm hand in Barren County in 1850. Owned six enslaved persons in Barren County in 1850. Farmer in Barren County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Barren County, Division 2, p. 442A.
